testcase.name: All icons are shown when enabled
All icons are hidden when not enabled
Filterbar has blue border when inner element has focus
The expand icon is disabled when content too small
The expand icon highlights when content is bigger than control area
Clicking the expand extends the filter bar
The clear button clears all content
Filter bar is expanded when alarge size
Filter bar is smaller when a compact size
Dropdown suggestions are shown when mouse over
A pill is created when a field option is clicked
A pill is created when a sort option is clicked
Brackets pills are created when brackets are selected
Suggestions change when a pill is selected
Selecting an operator applies the operator to the pill
Selecting empty removes the pills value
Selecting list removes turns the pills into a list
Selecting range removes turns the pills into a range

failure.message: suggestions.spec.ts:230:1 Selecting range removes turns the pills into a range

testcase.name: Selecting or removes adds the or operator
